title: Tynne - Re-worked & re-launched today.
content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ourhousegraphics/tynne/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414070420/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ourhousegraphics/tynne/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ourhousegraphics/tynne/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414070420im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MF%20Posters-06_5268.png)

I adjusted the tracking and kerning, then I made out-line-drop-shade versions of the roman and the italic which work independently or as part of a layered tow-colour font.
author: russellm
